```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(spotifyr)
access_token <- get_spotify_access_token()
```

```{r}
# goat <- get_discography("the mountain goats")
beths <- get_discography("the beths")
beths_sub <- beths %>% 
  select(
    album_name, album_release_year,
    track_name, track_number, track_n,
    danceability, energy, valence, tempo, duration_ms,
    loudness, speechiness, acousticness, instrumentalness, liveness
  ) %>%
slice(1:10) %>% ungroup()
```

```{r}
names(beths_sub)
```

```{r}
beths_sub %>% 
  arrange(desc(danceability)) %>% 
  select(track_name, danceability)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

beths_sub %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = track_n, y = tempo)) +
  geom_line()
```
